nodes.name: Adoption
adopt

nodes.documentation:
@dev Triggers circuit breaker and pauses all adoptions. Only admin can trigger. 
@return true bool if the circuitbreaker is successfully executed.
nodes.name: disable

nodes.documentation:
@dev Re-enables all adoptions. Only admin can trigger. 
@return true bool if isActive is now true.
nodes.name: enable

nodes.documentation:
@dev Gets the status of the isActive state variable. 
@return isActive bool

nodes.name: getAdopters

adopt(uint256).details: Marks a pet as adopted with the msg.sender as the new owner.isActive circuitBreaker must be == true in order for function to execute.

params.petId: the id of the pet, a uint between 0 and 15 inclusive.

adopt(uint256).return: petId the id of the successfully adopted pet.

bribe(uint256).details: Allows user to send a bribe with a value specified and a petId of their desired pet.

params.amount: the value attached to the bribe - anything less than 1 ether is refused.

bribe(uint256).return: string indicated the bribe was received successfully.

disable().details: Triggers circuit breaker and pauses all adoptions. Only admin can trigger.
disable().return: true bool if the circuitbreaker is successfully executed.

donate(uint256).details: Allows user to donate a specified amount.

params.amount: the value attached to the bribe - anything less than 1 ether is refused.

donate(uint256).return: string indicated the donation was received successfully.

enable().details: Re-enables all adoptions. Only admin can trigger.
enable().return: true bool if isActive is now true.

getAdopters().details: Retrieve a list of the adopters.
getAdopters().return: adopters a list of the new owners of the pets.

getStatus().details: Gets the status of the isActive state variable.

devdoc.title: Adoption contract for Kevin's Pet Shop.
